### normalize_text

``` python

def normalize_text(
    text:str
)->str:

```

*Normalize text by trimming whitespace and lowercasing.*

``` python
def test_normalize_text():
    assert normalize_text(" Hello ") == "hello"
    assert normalize_text("WORLD") == "world"
```
